predicate.note: Frames file for 'subtitle' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: obscure movies
example.text: Fortunately for Mary, most of the weird Slovenian movies John likes are subtitled *trace* in English.
example.arg: *trace* -> most of the weird Slovenian movies John likes

example.name: much like 'label'
example.text: ``Mastergate'' is subtitled *trace* ``a play on words,'' and Mr. Gelbart plays that game as well as anyone.
